thread.title: Heres what Marvels Phase 3 looks like
thread.title_full: Heres what Marvels Phase 3 looks like

title: Heres what Marvels Phase 3 looks like
text:
Here's what Marvel's Phase 3 looks like 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Saturday 10th October, 2015 
Phase 3 of Marvel's Cinematic Universe is coming out with total 14 films by 2020. 
The films include 'Captain America: Civil War,' which would be released next year on May 6, 'Doctor Strange' in November, 'Guardians of the Galaxy 2' in May 2017, 
'Spider-Man' in July 2017, 'Thor: Ragnarok' in November 2017, 'Black Panther' in February 2018, 'The Avengers: Infinity War Part 1' in May 2018, 'Ant-Man and the Wasp' in July 2018, 'Captain Marvel' in March 2019, 'The Avengers: Infinity War Part 2' in May 2019 and 'Inhumans' in July 2019, The Independent reports. 
There are three more untitled films of the studio that would be released in the year 2020. 
It has been very exciting for the fans as they have been speculating like crazy over which superheroes will fill these slots. (ANI) More Entertainment Industry News   their Â£1.6m   a 'black'
